Text: Black flag in high quality flac??? Why??? They recorded it in like a closet size studio with equipment considered primitive at the time lol.
because it's better than 128kbps.  dumb.  shit.

Black Flag... Flac??? LOL! 

It was originally recorded on like 8 track tape lol. The static is constant on the original even.
thank you!! Henry Rollins is an audiophile, btw... probably not when this was recorded but it's good it's in FLAC
